name: Titanium.UI.iOS.TableViewCellSelectionStyle
summary: A set of constants for the style that can be used for the selectionStyle property of Titanium.UI.TableViewRow.

constants.name: BLUE
constants.summary: The cell when selected has a blue background. This is the default value.

constants.name: GRAY
constants.summary: Then cell when selected has a gray background.

constants.name: NONE
constants.summary: The cell has no distinct style for when it is selected.
